  • Constructor Details

    • Tea

      public Tea​(String name, Liquid liquid, Boolean sugar, Boolean milk)
      Creates a Tea object with given name, Liquid and sugar.
      Parameters:
      name - name of Liquid
      liquid - only one liquid (maybe water) in drink, because it's a tea
      sugar - tells if the Tea is with or without sugar
      milk - tells if the Tea is with or without milk

  • Method Details

    • getMilk

      public boolean getMilk()
      Tells if the Tea has milk or not.
      Returns:
      true, if there is milk in the Tea

    • getSugar

      public boolean getSugar()
      Tells if the Tea has sugar or not.
      Returns:
      true, if there is sugar in the Tea

      Calculates and returns the alcohol percentage.
      Specified by:
      getAlcoholPercent in class Drink
      Returns:
      alcohol volume percent (e.g. 50)

    • isAlcoholic

      public boolean isAlcoholic()
      Gives information if Drink is alcoholic or not.
      Specified by:
      isAlcoholic in class Drink
      Returns:
